entry.title: My Second Blog Post
entry.summary: This is my second blog post using Pelican
entry.content:
Welcome to my new blog! This is my first post using Pelican, a static site generator written in Python.

Why Pelican?

Pelican is a great choice for a static blog because:

  1. It's written in Python
  2. It's fast and lightweight
  3. It supports Markdown
  4. It's highly customizable

code snippet

EXTRA_PATH_METADATA = {
    'extra/custom.css': {'path': 'static/custom.css'},
}
CUSTOM_CSS = 'static/custom.css'

table

First Header Second Header
Content Cell Content Cell
Content Cell Content Cell

What's Next?

In future posts, I'll be writing about:

  • Technology
  • Programming
  • Personal projects
  • And more!

Stay tuned for more content!
